text.text_translated: Some singers sell more albums than anyone else. But Springsteen is different from them. He is almost 70 years old. He still makes new music. His new music goes to the top of the charts. He plays shows in big stadiums. The stadiums are always full. He is still at the top. I am not surprised by this. He tells our most important stories about ourselves. You can listen to his album *Born in the USA*. The stories are as important for people now as they were in the past.
